cards.title: Feeling the heat / Temperatures soar across Europe

item.title: Temperatures soar across Europe
item.trailText: A widespread, long-lasting heatwave will spread across much of western Europe as Britain experiences its hottest day in nine years. Here are some ways to cool off
item.standFirst: A widespread, long-lasting heatwave will spread across much of western Europe as Britain experiences its hottest day in nine years. Here are some ways to cool off
